forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain and windy at times this morning. Thunder possible. High 14C. S winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 56F. S winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 61F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
